column5: Looking to upgrade the prop on my '15 Etec G2 (250HO) and i'm looking for a reputable dealer to help with this and service it while I'm at it. Preferably within 200kms from the GTA.  TIA.
I would recommend Leatherdale in Orillia Exceptional service and knowledge.
Do not let the merc name scare ya.  These guys are good. https://teamxtrememarine.com/about-us-1
Bellville Sport and Lawn or Emerald Ile both been rude dealers for 30 years.
